Package com.ceposmabecos.places

Interface PlacesListInterface

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
PlaceManager
public interface PlacesListInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
Breno

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlace​(Place place)
    This function should be called remotely to add a Place to the class HashMap of <String, Place>.
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Place> getAllPlaces()
    This function should be called remotely to retrieve the class HashMap of <String, Place>.
    Place getPlace​(java.lang.String postalCode)
    This function should be called remotely to retrieve a specific Place from the class HashMap of <String, Place>.

    This function should be called remotely to remove a Place to the class HashMap of <String, Place>.

    This function should be called remotely to change the class HashMap of <String, Place>.

  • Method Details

    • addPlace

      void addPlace​(Place place) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      This function should be called remotely to add a Place to the class HashMap of <String, Place>.
      Parameters:
      place - Contains object of type Place to be added.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - When it fails to reach the the host.

    • removePlace

      Place removePlace​(java.lang.String postalCode) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      This function should be called remotely to remove a Place to the class HashMap of <String, Place>.
      Parameters:
      postalCode - Contains string with postalCode to be used to remove the Place.
      Returns:
      Place This returns the deleted Place.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - When it fails to reach the the host.

    • getPlace

      Place getPlace​(java.lang.String postalCode) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      This function should be called remotely to retrieve a specific Place from the class HashMap of <String, Place>.
      Parameters:
      postalCode - Contains string with postalCode to be used to search the Place.
      Returns:
      Place This returns the corresponding Place.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - When it fails to reach the host.

    • getAllPlaces

      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Place> getAllPlaces() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      This function should be called remotely to retrieve the class HashMap of <String, Place>.
      Returns:
      HashMap This returns all Place.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - When it fails to reach the host.
      See Also:
      RemoteException

    • setAllPlaces

      void setAllPlaces​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Place> places) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      This function should be called remotely to change the class HashMap of <String, Place>.
      Parameters:
      places - Contains HashMap of <String, Place>.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - When it fails to reach the host.
      See Also:
      RemoteException
